author: Brandjuh
description: Incident Roulette - Emergency response allocation game with economy integration. Test your resource allocation skills with randomized incident calls!
install_msg: Thanks for installing Incident Roulette! Use `/roulette start` to begin playing. Admins can configure settings with `/roulette_config`. See the README for full documentation.
name: IncidentRoulette
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user gameplay statistics, scores, and economy transactions per guild.
